subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Madrid's 3-0 victory over Galatasaray was so emphatic that it would be one of the shocks of soccer history if the Turkish champion were to advance after the return match.
snippet: Madrid's 3-0 victory over Galatasaray was so emphatic that it would be one of the shocks of soccer history if the Turkish champion were to advance after the return match.
